titleStmt.title: The accompt clear'd in answer to a libel intituled, A true account from Chichester, concerning the death of Habin the informer &c. / by Roger L'Estrange.
titleStmt.author: L'Estrange, Roger, Sir, 1616-1704.

notesStmt.note: Contains the Chichester account and various affidavits.
Imperfect: pages cropped with slight loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
